pages.text: $(thing)The Momotheists Villages$() are villages that are entirely dedicated to the Momotheism Cult and reserved only for confirmed Momotheists. These villages can be found frequently in any forest.
The photograph of a momotheist village.
These villages contains many components that are assigned to a task.

pages.title: Checkpoint
pages.text: Contains a card reader and access cards from the $(thing)laboratory73$() universe.

pages.title: Dorm
pages.text: Where the Momotheists sleep. There is also a campfire inside.

pages.title: Common Farm
pages.text: You can find wheat here, and momoroses. A farmer is usually inside.

pages.title: Momotheist Cathedral
pages.text: The cult area, where you can find $(thing)Momobibles$() and cult tables.

pages.title: The Priviledged House
pages.text: Where priviledged individuals lives. Contains a bed and many bookshelves.

pages.title: The Panic Room
pages.text: Where everyone meet up when a problem occurs. Contains a set of armor ready to battle !

pages.title: The Storage Room
pages.text: The storage of the village, you can find cool stuff inside, like diamonds.

pages.title: The Defense Outpost
pages.text: Someone always defend the village right here. The Momotheists aren't the most beloved ones.
